title: For loops
text: When running this for loop, we have now exhausted the first value of c. What is the next value of c?

title: For loops
text: After finding the second value of c, you go to the next line: is c < 2? If so, compute the body. If not, move to the else statement, and compute the body.

title: np.arange()
text: What is the second value in np.arange(5)?

title: For loops
text: After determining c is less than $$2$$, is c % $$2$$ $$==$$ 0? If so, print the statement. If not, move on.
